OOC: Well, let's say I don't know all transformer's weaponry by 
heart... =/

Bic:

Blackfang: You seem to be an okay pred, if that can exist. You think 
there's anything specific we should know before we fight them?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> OOC: I'll give you a chance to retract that rather foolish post.  
> Apparently you've never seen a Seeker jet - they have obvious 
weapons 
> mounted on both arms.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Blackfang nods.
> > 
> > Blackfang: As ya will. You seem rather okay for a pred. You'll 
need 
> > some weaponry for the fight?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > "I have a personal grudge against the new Predacon leader, 
> Hydras." 
> >  
> > > Empath says flatly.  "Let's leave it at that."
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > Ragnar grinned.
> > > > 
> > > > Ragnar: Why, thank you! It is purely the Clan way of thinking, 
> > > though. 
> > > > No waste of ressources. Since you stood there, I assumed you 
> were 
> > > > invited in. Otherwise, I would not have been the first to fire 
> on 
> > > you, 
> > > > quiaff?
> > > > 
> > > > Blackfang, still sitting on a couch, nods.
> > > > 
> > > > Blackfang: He's bright. No wonder you got a command. What 
about 
> > > you, 
> > > > pred? How come you're here, sympathizing with a bunch of 
maxies?
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > > "Oh, you're a funny one."  Empath sits down.  "Most people 
> would 
> > > > have 
> > > > > asked what the hell a Predacon was doing in Maximal 
> > headquarters, 
> > > > and 
> > > > > how I knew your name without meeting you before.  You went 
> > > straight 
> > > > > to the argument phase.  I think I'm going to like you."
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > > Ragnar: Neg. I rarely challenge an ally unless they sully 
> my 
> > > > honor. 
> > > > > > From where I come, though, I am an elite warrior and this 
> mech 
> > > I 
> > > > > have 
> > > > > > become is one of the fiercest ever built. I can take two 
> > > Predacons 
> > > > > at 
> > > > > > once.
> > > > > >

wrote:
> > > > > > > Empath::
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > "He's right, Ragnar."  Empath points out.  "If you want 
> to 
> > > talk 
> > > > > > > credentials, I can give you an earful.  And if you were 
> > > thinking 
> > > > > of 
> > > > > > > challenging me to one of your silly trials on that 
point, 
> I 
> > > > > promise 
> > > > > > > you'll be dead before you can land a hit on me."
> > > > > > >

his

> > > > > toward
